page.title: 04BISHOPS WALTHAM TOURISM
page.content: Bishops Waltham offers a wide range of facilities for{tourists.}The main attraction is the{Palace Ruins.}It is at the Palace that an annual fete' happens on June 1st. Most local societies run stalls at it to make funds. It is usually a great success. There is a small craft centre called The{Granary}opposite the Garden Centre where local{craftsmen}sell and exhibit their work. It is attached to a Restaurant bearing the same name. Nearby is an{Art Gallery}which will open soon. In the area there many{Public Houses but the{Priory Inn}is the only one to provide accomodation. It has three single rooms which adjoin. Also it has a double room. It is Â£10.00 per person per night. It is also nice for a meal.
